component.name: Odamex
component.summary: Client, server, and launcher for classic DOOM multiplayer

description.p: Odamex is a multiplayer-oriented DOOM port with a focus on classic DOOM gameplay. Perfect for playing with friends or alone, Odamex is faithful to the original Doom games. It has the ability to play back vanilla demos, while also providing an enhanced experience with modern quality-of-life features and expanded modding capabilites.

ul.li:
General Improvements on the Original Games
Can play many Doom engine games, including Ultimate DOOM, DOOM II, Final DOOM, Freedoom, Chex Quest, Hacx, and REKKR
Supports many modern editing features, such as “limit removing”, Boom, MBF, MBF21, and ID24
Supports Hexen format and older ZDoom format maps
Uncapped framerate
High resolutions
Widescreen support up to 32:9 ratio (ultra widescreen)
32-bit color renderer
Multiple ways to playback MIDI music, including an FM Synth emulator to rekindle those 1990s memories
Supports MOD and other tracker music, MP3, and OGG in custom wads
Quake-style console and key bindings
Crosshairs
Extended HUD
Mouselook, jumping, swimming, and flying
Walk over/under monsters and other things

Unmatched Multiplayer Experience
Support for up to 255 players at once
Top tier network code. Play with your friends on the other side of the world!
Unlagged - Odamex will compensate for poor network conditions
Exciting multiplayer gamemodes:
Cooperative & Survival
Deathmatch / Team Deathmatch
Last Man Standing / Team Last Man Standing
Capture the Flag
The Cacoward winning Horde mode
And more!
In-game wad downloading
On-the-fly wad loading (servers can run hundreds of wads without you disconnecting!)
Vote to change server settings such as fraglimit, timelimit, map, and more (must be enabled on server)
Custom player colors

description.p: To use your own Timidity config file, use this command: flatpak override net.odamex.Odamex --env=TIMIDITY_CFG=<config location>

p.em: Note: The included version of Timidity does NOT support soundfonts, only GUS patches.

description.p: A copy of DOOM, DOOM II, Freedoom, Hacx, REKKR, or Chex Quest is required. If you do not own DOOM, it can be purchased on GOG or Steam.
